content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I can help you get started with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC work. Can I have your name, please?
Thanks, Tom! What’s the address where you need service?
Great! What plumbing issue do you need help with?
Leaky pipe under the kitchen sink. Not an emergency, but should get fixed soon.
Thanks for letting me know, Tom. When would be the best time for us to send a plumber out to take care of that leak?
Honestly, I’m totally slammed this month. There’s no way I can be home for an appointment right now. Can we just leave it for now?
reason: Customer too busy to schedule this month.

content: Absolutely, Tom. If your schedule frees up or you need urgent help, just message us anytime and we’ll set it up right away. Have a good month!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule this month.
